item.title: Israel Pressures Hamas to Return Bodies, but Gaza’s Destruction Poses Challenge
item.description: The Israeli government is considering limits on aid to Gaza to penalize Hamas for not turning over more bodies of former hostages. But devastation in ...

item.title: ‘A Big Day’: How the U.S. and the Arab World Teamed Up to Seal the Gaza Deal
item.description: The cease-fire talks in Egypt showed that with pressure on Hamas and Israel, seemingly huge impediments could be overcome or set aside.

item.title: Madagascar Rejoices After Military Takeover and Impeachment
item.description: The change in power came after Parliament voted to impeach President Andry Rajoelina, who faced mounting pressure after weeks of Gen Z protests.

item.title: Military Claims Power in Madagascar After President Is Impeached
item.description: The military in Madagascar assumed power after lawmakers voted to impeach President Andry Rajoelina on Tuesday. Mr. Rajoelina had gone into hiding on ...

item.title: What to Know About the Protests in Madagascar
item.description: President Andry Rajoelina appears to have left the country after weeks of protests calling for him to resign.
